name: Don't lose
description:
If you lose you have to start again.

This game is a rage game!

discordchannel for everything i program:

https://discord.gg/Kk4Fc847

Controls:

keyboard:

WASD/arrows = walking

z = shoot

x = dash

c = ultimate attack

v = walk through doors

space = jump

esc = pauze menu

controller:

left joystick = walking

b = shoot

rt = dash

y = ultimate attack

lt = walk through doors

a = jump

start = pauze menu / start level
